speaker: LEAR
text: Go you before to Gloucester with these

speaker: LEAR
text: letters. Acquaint my daughter no further with anything

speaker: LEAR
text: you know than comes from her demand out of

speaker: LEAR
text: the letter. If your diligence be not speedy, I shall be

speaker: LEAR
text: there afore you.

speaker: KENT
text: I will not sleep, my lord, till I have delivered

speaker: KENT
text: your letter.

speaker: FOOL
text: If a man’s brains were in ’s heels, were ’t not in

speaker: FOOL
text: danger of kibes?

speaker: LEAR
text: Ay, boy.

speaker: FOOL
text: Then, I prithee, be merry; thy wit shall not go

speaker: FOOL
text: slipshod.

speaker: LEAR
text: Ha, ha, ha!

speaker: FOOL
text: Shalt see thy other daughter will use thee kindly,

speaker: FOOL
text: for, though she’s as like this as a crab’s like an

speaker: FOOL
text: apple, yet I can tell what I can tell.

speaker: LEAR
text: What canst tell, boy?

speaker: FOOL
text: She will taste as like this as a crab does to a crab.

speaker: FOOL
text: Thou canst tell why one’s nose stands i’ th’ middle

speaker: FOOL
text: on ’s face?

speaker: LEAR
text: No.

speaker: FOOL
text: Why, to keep one’s eyes of either side ’s nose,

speaker: FOOL
text: that what a man cannot smell out he may spy into.

speaker: LEAR
text: I did her wrong.

speaker: FOOL
text: Canst tell how an oyster makes his shell?

speaker: LEAR
text: No.

speaker: FOOL
text: Nor I neither. But I can tell why a snail has a

speaker: FOOL
text: house.

speaker: LEAR
text: Why?

speaker: FOOL
text: Why, to put ’s head in, not to give it away to his

speaker: FOOL
text: daughters and leave his horns without a case.

speaker: LEAR
text: I will forget my nature. So kind a father!—Be

speaker: LEAR
text: my horses ready?

speaker: FOOL
text: Thy asses are gone about ’em. The reason why

speaker: FOOL
text: the seven stars are no more than seven is a pretty

speaker: FOOL
text: reason.

speaker: LEAR
text: Because they are not eight.

speaker: FOOL
text: Yes, indeed. Thou wouldst make a good Fool.

speaker: LEAR
text: To take ’t again perforce! Monster ingratitude!

speaker: FOOL
text: If thou wert my Fool, nuncle, I’d have thee

speaker: FOOL
text: beaten for being old before thy time.

speaker: LEAR
text: How’s that?

speaker: FOOL
text: Thou shouldst not have been old till thou hadst

speaker: FOOL
text: been wise.

speaker: LEAR
text:
O
              ,
               
              let
               
              me
               
              not
               
              be
               
              mad
              ,
               
              not
               
              mad
              ,
               
              sweet
               
              heaven
              !

speaker: LEAR
text:
Keep
               
              me
               
              in
               
              temper
              .
               
              I
               
              would
               
              not
               
              be
               
              mad
              !

speaker: LEAR
text:
How
               
              now
              ,
               
              are
               
              the
               
              horses
               
              ready
              ?

speaker: GENTLEMAN
text:
Ready
              ,
               
              my
               
              lord
              .

speaker: LEAR
text:
Come
              ,
               
              boy
              .

speaker: FOOL
text:
She
               
              that’s
               
              a
               
              maid
               
              now
               
              and
               
              laughs
               
              at
               
              my
               
              departure
              ,

speaker: FOOL
text:
Shall
               
              not
               
              be
               
              a
               
              maid
               
              long
              ,
               
              unless
               
              things
               
              be
               
              cut
               
              shorter
              .
